column1: Master Programme (One Year) in Textile Management
column5: Are you interested in pursuing a career in the Fashion and Apparel industry? This programme will give you an introduction to the fundamentals of Textiles and Fashion to build on your existing degree in business administration, industrial economy, textile engineering, textile design, fashion design, or equivalent. Our programme will introduce you to the most recent research on sustainability in textile management and offer a dynamic learning environment with students from all over the world. Together. we create leaders that are ready to make a change in one of the most polluting industries in the world.
